verse.name: v1
verse.lines: It was early last December, as near as I remember Oh I staggered down the street and tipsy cried No one I was disturbing, as I lay down by the curbing And then a pig came up and lay down by my side

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: As I lay there by the gutter, thinking thoughts I cannot ...Utter A Lady passing by was heard to say... Spoken *Hmmmmm. Well, well, well* Sung You can tell a man who boozes, by the company he chooses And then the pig got up and slowly walked away
